name: Broadwater Health Center
description: Broadwater Health Center in Townsend Montana has been caring for Broadwater County residents for over 100 years!  Our hospital is a non-profit facility that is supported by the community through volunteer efforts and generous contributions.

name: Mountainview Medical Center
description:
Mountainview Medical Center is prepared for infectious diseases including COVID-19. Please share the following information with friends, family, and neighbors of our community.
If you feel ill and may have been exposed to the Corona Virus, please DO NOT COME directly to the hospital or clinic. First call one of the following numbers for screening.
• Hospital/clinic 24/7: 406-547-3321
• Public Health Monday Thursday: 406-547-3234

name: Wheatland Memorial Healthcare
description: Responsive to the healthcare needs of the communities we serve. Wheatland Memorial Healthcare is dedicated to providing sustainable quality care with respect, compassion and teamwork.

name: Central Montana Medical Center
description: Nestled on top of a hill with a view of 5 majestic mountain ranges is our community hospital: Central Montana Medical Center, or informally known as “CMMC.” CMMC is a 25-bed critical access hospital. We provide a full range of services from rehab, home health/hospice, in/outpatient surgical services to obstetrics, emergency, intensive care and high tech radiology services accompanied with a complete staff of specialty physicians.

name: Roundup Memorial Healthcare
description: Roundup Memorial Healthcare is a 25 bed Critical Access Hospital.  Our emergency room and acute care unit offers comprehensive medical care with state of the art medical equipment.  We also offer outpatient services, skilled bed services, transitional care services, and long term care services while using an interdisciplinary team approach.
